name: apim-deploy
description: Visual Studio Team Services Build and Release Tasks for Azure API Management

scripts.prelink:tasks: mkdirp dist/_temp/node_modules && pushd "dist/_temp" && npm install vsts-task-lib@2.0.5 && npm install q@1.4.1 && npm install request@2.81.0 && popd
scripts.build:tasks: npm run clean && npm run build:tasks:noclean
scripts.build:tasks:noclean: npm run prelink:tasks && npm run compile:tasks && npm run content:tasks && npm run content:extension:tasks  && npm run link:tasks
scripts.package:tasks: tfx extension create --root dist --output-path dist --manifest-globs vss-extension.json

author: Pawel Lukasiak
